tool_description: Applies professional formatting standards to business documents including headers, spacing, fonts, and visual hierarchy according to corporate style guides.

raw_content.description: Unformatted document content to be styled

style_guide.description: Formatting standard to apply: apa, mla, chicago, corporate, or custom

include_headers.description: Whether to add professional headers and footers

table_of_contents.description: Whether to generate a table of contents

font_preference.description: Preferred font family: times, arial, calibri, or default

spacing_type.description: Line spacing: single, double, or one_and_half

error_messages: Empty content: Provide raw content for formatting
Invalid style guide: Use one of [apa, mla, chicago, corporate, custom]
Invalid font preference: Use one of [times, arial, calibri, default]
Invalid spacing type: Use one of [single, double, one_and_half]
Content too large: Document exceeds maximum formatting capacity
usage: Provide raw_content and style_guide for professional formatting. Configure headers, page numbers, table of contents, font, and spacing as needed.

formatting_applied.description: List of formatting elements applied to the document

style_compliance.description: Compliance score with selected style guide (0-100)
